data.name: Draconid
data.description:
The Neutrals - Draconid [E]
Units:
+5% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage
-5% cost
-12.5% mana

Upgrades:
-1Lv Magic
+10% research speed

Magic:
Fire Bolt (Stuns the target for 3 seconds)
Reinforcements (Summons Lizardman Warrior for 20 seconds)

Traits: Draconid are mortals empowered by the dragons they serve. This faction is great in the early game but due to the lack of magic, it starts to lose heavily later on. Strong heroes that constantly increase their power are the key to dominating the map.

Difficulty: Advanced
Created: by Ksay

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Slow Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit attack speed
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Vampiric Aura
auras.description:
30% melee lifesteal
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.description:
Reliquary of dragon power. Has 20 mana and 4 levels of tier. For every 15 trophies, you can choose an additional bonus for yourself.
(can be upgraded inside this building)

When you kill a hero, you get 1 Dragon Trophy, and 4 Dragon Trophies for killing Special Unit.

Also, every 1 minute you get 1 Dragon Trophy

bonuses.name: Cataclysm [C]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Kings of Slaughter

The cultists discovered an ancient Artifact, planning to research it's potential. They are sure nothing dangerous will happen...

spells.name: CATACLYSM
spells.description:
Abilities:
The Awakening (Damage Spell)
Requirements: Dragon Keep Lv 1)
Deals 100-300 damage in a line every 180-60 seconds
(3000 range)

Power of the Rift (Support Aura)
Requirements: Dragon Keep Lv 2)
4-8 HP bonus regeneration
(3000 range)

Control over Rift's power (Disable Aura)
Requirements: Dragon Keep Lv 3)
Enemy buuildings -3 regenerate HP and -0.5 MP
(All the maps)

Abilities improve with Dragon Keep

spells.name: CATACLYSM
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Kings of Slaughter

The cultists discovered an ancient Artifact, planning to research it's potential. They are sure nothing dangerous will happen...

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: CATACLYSM
spells.description:
Void Rift is placed in the middle of the map and belongs to you. It's invulnerable, but intitially has no power and requires some empowerment to gain new effects.

Rift's Favor:
Heroes present near the Rift will take control over the Rift, granting it's power to the player controlling the Hero. If more than 2 Heroes are present in the area, the Rift will switch side to a random one every 10 seconds. If no Heroes are present, control of the Rift remains in the hands of the player who last controlled the area

bonuses.name: Dragon Sphere [W]
bonuses.description:
Increases Warrior and Champion attack rate by 7% and gives them 5%/7%/9% chance to spawn an Egg after killing enemy unit. When Egg hatches, it summons a Draconid Warrior
(upgrades together with Dragon Keep)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.description:

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Enkindling
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Draconid Crossbowman
(affects buildings only)

Lv1: 10 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 20 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 30 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 40 damage/sec for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Melting Armour
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance, reduce target's armor on attack
Affects: Draconid Tower and Dark Wyvern
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Lv1: 20% chance, -3 armor for 3 sec
Lv2: 40% chance, -6 armor for 4 sec
Lv3: 60% chance, -9 armor for 5 sec
Lv4: 80% chance, -12 armor for 6 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Devour
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate and heals after a kill
Affects: Draconid Warrior and Champion

Lv1: 30 HP and +10% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv2: 60 HP and +20% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv3: 90 HP and +30% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv4: 120 HP and +40% attack rate for 10 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Dragon's Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus armor and hit points
Affects: Warrior, Champion and Dark Wyvern

Lv1: +2 armor and +25 HP
Lv2: +4 armor and +50 HP
Lv3: +6 armor and +75 HP
Lv4: +8 armor and +100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Dancing Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage
Affects: Heavy Gunner

Lv1: 80 damage in 300 AoE
Lv2: 160 damage in 300 AoE
Lv3: 240 damage in 300 AoE
Lv4: 320 damage in 300 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Reflective Scales
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage when attacked
Affects: Champion

Lv1: 8% to do 20 damage in 125 AoE
Lv2: 16% to do 30 damage in 150 AoE
Lv3: 24% to do 40 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: 32% to do 50 damage in 200 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Lurking Stalker
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Shadow Strike (dmg to ranged units)
30/60/90/120 damage
Lv2: has Endurance Aura (bonus attack rate)
+4%/+8%/+12% in 700 AoE
Lv3: has Chain Lightning (damage spell)
100/140 damage to 7 units
Lv4: has Critical Strike (bonus damage on attack)
15% chance for 4x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Pride
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: improves reinforcements ability
Affects: Draconid Mage

Lv1: can call one Lizardmen Archer
(has no abilities)
Lv2: can call one Lizardmen Archer
(has Bloodlust +8% AS)
Lv3: can call one Lizardmen Warrior
(has a 30% block)
Lv4: can call one Lizardman Fly Stinger
(has a spell steal)

towerUpgrades.name: Kings of Slaughter
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus stats and heal for killing heroes
Affects: All Heroes

Lv1: +5% heal
Lv2: +10% heal, +1 main stats
Lv3: +10% heal, +1 all stats
Lv4: +15% heal +1 all stats, +1 main stats
